mdRecord.dcterms:title: Buckingham Village, general view
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
Wright, Henry (American city planner and architect, 1878-1936) [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The buildings are arranged in U-shaped complexes enclosing grassy lawns planted with oak and elm trees. Wright located a shopping center at the intersection of two major streets in the middle of the community, evoking the idea of a traditional village center -- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Henry_Wright_%28landscape_architect%29 [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Architecture and City Planning
